title: 1967 Ford Bronco Pickup
item_description:

1967 Ford Bronco Brochure 

Note: Certificate of Duplicate Title, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once the court order is received. Please allow 3-4 weeks after removal. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
